definition: bones of the temple (on the human head)/see 顳顬|颞颥, temple

sentences.english: SPECT imaging will demonstrate decreased radiotracer uptake in the frontal and temporal lobes.
sentences.chinese: SPECT成像显示额颞叶放射性摄取减低。

sentences.english: The main correlational language cortex included left temporal lobe and bilateral inferior frontal gyrus.
sentences.chinese: 主要语言相关皮层区为左颞叶及双侧额下回。

sentences.english: The expression of TRPC6 was not detected in patients' temporal lobe in this study.
sentences.chinese: TRPC6在本研究的颞叶脑组织中均未检测到表达。

sentences.english: Conclusions Most of the children who had temporal lobe surgery for intractable TLE had good seizure outcome.
sentences.chinese: 结论颞叶切除治疗儿童难治性TLE多数预后良好。

sentences.english: Lastly, there are the temporal lobes, near the temples, which are involved with hearing and memory.
sentences.chinese: 最后面是颞叶，它在太阳穴附近，关系到听觉和记忆。

sentences.english: Without this bone, the membranous canal is exposed to the overlying dura mater membrane of the brain's temporal lobe.
sentences.chinese: 这样膜管便会暴露在大脑的颞叶的覆硬脑膜中。

sentences.english: It's also common among people with temporal lobe epilepsy.
sentences.chinese: 这一点，对于那些患有颞叶癫痫病的人来说也很普遍。

sentences.english: Data of both temporal lobes and midbrain were collected for analysis.
sentences.chinese: 所有研究对象均取双侧颞叶及中脑数据。

sentences.english: The cysts are most often juxtaventricular in location within the brain parenchyma involving the frontal or temporal lobes.
sentences.chinese: 囊肿常常邻近于脑室的脑实质内，累及额叶或颞叶。

sentences.english: EEG showed abnormal electrical activity on temporal lobe.
sentences.chinese: 脑电图检查颞叶呈异常电活动。

sentences.english: The tumor is located in the right amygdala, with irregular activity seen in the surrounding right temporal lobe.
sentences.chinese: 肿瘤位于右侧杏仁核，在右颞叶周围不规则运动。

definition: bones of the temple (on the human head)/see 顳顬|颞颥, temple
